edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme

Interface CmtCCommitmentMsg

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CmtElGamalCommitmentMessage, CmtPedersenCommitmentMessage, CmtSimpleHashCommitmentMessage

    public interface CmtCCommitmentMsg
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface represents the commitment message sent from the committer to the receiver during the commitment phase. Every commitment has an id needed to identify the specific commitment in the case that many commitments are performed by the committer without decommiting in between the commitments. Each commitment has an id attached to it used lated for decommitment.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      java.lang.Object getCommitment()
      The commitment objects can vary, therefore returns an Object instance.
      long getId()
      Returns the unique id of the commitment.
